C

calculateDamage(Pokemon, Pokemon, Move, double, boolean) - Method in class projectpokemon.logic.Battle
Calculates and returns the damage caused by the attacking pokemon's move on the defender.
calculateModifier(Pokemon, Pokemon, Move, boolean) - Method in class projectpokemon.logic.Battle
Calculates and returns the modifier that will be further used to calculate the damage that the defending pokemon will take.
calculateScore(Move, Pokemon, Pokemon) - Method in class projectpokemon.logic.BattleAI
Calculates and returns the score of a move, given the pokemon that will use it (self) and the one it will be used against (target).
chooseMove() - Method in class projectpokemon.logic.BattleAI
Calculates and returns the index of the move that the AI will use.
chooseSwitch() - Method in class projectpokemon.logic.BattleAI
Calculates and returns the index of the best pokemon that the AI trainer can switch to.
